channel.title: arm. "Tor Disconnected"
channel.description: Time from time i see message in arm that "Tor Disconnected". I restart arm and it shows that it's working. These times when tor stopped or disconnected in my gateway, traffic from workstation is droped or how that works ? I'm worrying that when my tor disconnects my traffic from workstations becomes, like my normal traffic from host.

item.title: arm. "Tor Disconnected"
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Arm causes loads of confusion, documented here:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Controller#Arm

So I would not be surprised if that was another arm bug.

There will be no clearnet leaks wether Tor works or not because of
